name: Adware Out of Control
description:
A game where you have to complete yur assignments whilst tackling with annoying adware popups.

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.
This is the first Game Jam I have participated in so the project might not look appeasing, and the graphics may look ugly, however I'm proud to be able to submit a game for a game jam and will try better next time.

You can find the source code for the game here:

https://github.com/Zanark/GMTK-Game-Jam-2020
